pkgmetadata.longdescription: MARISA is a static and space-efficient trie data structure. MARISA stands for Matching Algorithm with Recursively Implemented StorAge. This library provides a C++ library and command line tools to build and search a MARISA-trie. Python bindings are also available.
MARISA 是一个静态的、空间高效的 trie 数据结构。 MARISA 代表递归实现存储的匹配算法（Matching Algorithm with Recursively Implemented StorAge）。 此库提供 C++ 库和命令行工具来构建和搜索 MARISA-trie。同时提供 Python 绑定。
